news.content:
Your Weekly 3Node Team Update!


https://forum.threefold.io/t/november-22nd-3node-team-update-shipping-compensation-upgrading-the-process-more/1509


This week, we’re covering shipping, compensation for the unexpected 3Node configuration issue, upgrades to our process, expanding support, & clarifying our communication channels.


Please stay tuned on the farming chat and we’ll share another update again here next week!
news.excerpt: This week, we’re covering shipping, compensation for the unexpected 3Node configuration issue, upgrades to our process, expanding support, & more.

previous.title: Your November 29 Titan Update
previous.excerpt: Today, the first batch of Titans begins shipping to North America!

next.title: Your January 6 3Node Team Update
next.excerpt: This week's update is focused on shipping as well as farming rewards, anda  reminder about our deep dives!
